scripts.postrelease: git push --follow-tags origin main && git push origin --tags
scripts.commit-changes: git diff-index --quiet HEAD || (git add . && git commit -m 'chore(docs): update docs and build outputs')
scripts.prerelease: yarn build && yarn tsdoc && yarn update-readme && yarn commit-changes

scripts.postbump: git commit --no-verify -m 'chore(release): bump version' CHANGELOG.md package.json
scripts.postchangelog: git commit --no-verify -m 'chore(release): update changelog' CHANGELOG.md package.json
scripts.posttag: git commit --no-verify -m 'chore(release): tag release' CHANGELOG.md package.json
